remarks: The variables in a polynomial algebra are contained in every subring algebra.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jul-2015.)
statement:
subrgmvr.v $e |- V = ( I mVar R ) $.
subrgmvr.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
subrgmvr.r $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) $.
subrgmvr.h $e |- H = ( R |`s T ) $.
subrgmvrf.u $e |- U = ( I mPoly H ) $.
subrgmvrf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` U ) $.
subrgmvrf $p |- ( ph -> V : I --> B ) $.
